### Installation

#### PyPI (easiest)
```bash
pip install robust-vision==X.Y.Z
```

#### Docker
```bash
docker pull or4k2l/robust-vision:X.Y.Z
docker pull or4k2l/robust-vision:latest
```

#### From source
```bash
git clone https://github.com/or4k2l/robust-vision.git
cd robust-vision
git checkout vX.Y.Z
pip install -e .
```
